item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:

28. Google to pay $28M to settle claims it favoured white and Asian employees (77 points | 67 comments)
29. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (572 points | 758 comments)
